price: Na wale ambao mizani zao zitakuwa nyepesi, hao ndio walio zitia khasarani nafsi zao, na katika Jahannamu watadumu.
arabic: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فِي جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
footnotes: Na asiye kuwa na thawabu au vitendo vyenye uzito mbele ya Mwenyezi Mungu, hao ndio walio zikhasiri nafsi zao kwa kuziuza kwa Shetani. Nao wataadhibiwa Motoni, wadumu humo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waman khaffat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fī jahannama khālidūna
